title: 1.4 Master Challenge 1
question:
Write down the pseudocode and JavaScript code to create a student registration form.
Ask the user to enter the first and last name.
For the full name, concatenate the first name and last name.
Ask the user to input the grade and subjects.
Ask the user to input the address for communication.
Display the details of the student.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
